title: The Twits
description: Netflix’s animated take on Roald Dahl’s classic tale about a nasty couple who play tricks on each other—perfect for fans of quirky humor

title: Avatar: Fire and Ash
description: The next epic in James Cameron’s Avatar series, expected to expand the lore of Pandora and introduce new elemental themes.

title: Sinners
description: Twin brothers open a juke joint in 1932 Mississippi, only to face a vampiric evil.

title: Lilo & Stitch
description: An alien fugitive finds family and love with a spirited Hawaiian girl and her sister

title: Back to the Future
description: A teenager travels through time in a DeLorean, altering the past and racing to fix the future.

title: The Dark Knight
description: Batman faces his greatest challenge yet—the Joker—in a gritty battle for Gotham’s soul

title: Arrival
description: When aliens arrive, a linguist must decode their language to unlock a message that could change time.

title: Parasite
description: A gripping tale of class divide and deception, where two families collide in unexpected ways.
